name: Hylianum: Introduction
description:
.

HYALINUM is a game in two parts.

This first part is a walking simulator, the duration is around 15 minutes.

There are little game mechanics with no big difficulties.

HYALINUM is a wandering experience that will lead the character to meet someone else in the part 2.

That following is a game with completly different mechanics.

The second part is actually in devlopment since April 4 ,2020.

I explain all of it about my project and how to help/support me for the following HERE. French FAQ here.

The game is in english and french.

Useful  informations:

ZQSD or WASD to move.

Shift to run.

Echap to pause.

The game size is 252mo.

2gb of ram needed. 

Donating more than 1$ will give you a 50% reduction for the next game. Preorder Hyalinum : Part II for 5$ here. Remember, the mail adress you provide is the one where you will receive your reduction the day the game is released.
